body:
Note: This is not a hate post aimed towards Avicus or IvyCode in any shape or form. Please try to read it in my own eyes and not take it as an insult. I am simply stating my opinion.

Hello there Avicans,
Today I am going to be discussing somethings interesting.

Firstly let me talk about the Demotions.
Avicus is a business and sometimes some staff don't really benefit the server so they have to be "taken out" or demoted. Its that simple, and it makes perfect sense.

Secondly let me touch upon the subject of the community thinning out slightly.
So recently we have lost many forum members, but thats there choice and you have to respect that.

Thirdly let me discuss Avicus' "originality". Avicus is not original, most if not all the games can be found on other servers. I don't find it cool, Avicus advertising as all original when most everything can be found on other networks:

Nebula on: SB & OCN
Walls on: HP & MP
Elimination on: Tons of small networks
Nexus on: OCN & any KitPVP server
Control the Hill on: TC & any KotH server
Avicade on: TCN

Fourthly, 
Staff members receive little to no recognition from Avicus its self, the community often thanks them and that is greatly appreciated by all the staff.

I really do believe that this all can be fixed, and I really do believe in Avicus.
Thank you for taking the time to read this post, feel free to share your opinions below, correct me if I'm wrong! :D

Extra: I have the deepest most strong respect for Ivy who has put hours and hours everyday into Avicus.

title: Avicus Discussion/Opinons

replies.body: This is not a post to try to get Mod back or anything. I resigned out of my own free will.

replies.body: Although I've only been staff on Avicus for a very short time, I expect nothing in reward. I try my hardest to collaborate with fellow staff members in making Avicus the best it can be. I expect nothing in return.
replies.body_tagged: Although I've only been staff on Avicus for a very short time, I expect nothing in reward. I try my hardest to collaborate with fellow staff members in making Avicus the best it can be. I expect nothing in return.

replies.body: Wait. Since when is Nexus on OCN?
replies.body_tagged: Wait. Since when is Nexus on OCN?

replies.body:
Thirdly let me discuss Avicus' "originality". Avicus is not original, most if not all the games can be found on other servers. I don't find it cool, Avicus advertising as all original when most everything can be found on other networks:

Some of these game modes are only found on a few servers, also, part of the reason Nexus was removed was because it was unoriginal, but it didn't matter because the community loved it so much.

Fourthly, 
Staff members are not rewarded (I may be wrong), no pets, no trails, no classes. A staff member puts hours into Avicus and are not even rewarded a tiny bit.                                                                                                                                                                              Moderating is a volunteer job, and rewards like these just distract you from actually moderating.

replies.body:
@subzero
None of the Avicus game modes are original, whether Funky coded them or not. The game itself is not original. Control the Hill is Control Point on the Core, Nebula is a smaller version of Project Ares, Elimination is everywhere as HG, Nexus is just a fun TDM, The Walls can be found on multiple servers, MCZone was just one of the first to have it on a server, but the game was already well known. Avicus is not original, but it is well coded, and is well designed.
